Updated UnocalNNG WAHA transport w NHigginsTMartinSMahmassaniJGomezBRedmondLDruzbikJTholtWhen Friday October PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where If you have any questions concerning the meeting and its subject matter please direct them to Ned Higgins at If you have questions about the meeting time place or your availability please call Lacye Trevino at Thank you Lacye Trevino Administrative Assistant Enron North America A Houston Texas

CA for MarkWestour conversation The company name MarkWest Hydrocarbon Inc Inverness Drive West Suite Englewood CO Attn Phil Archer Description MarkWest is installing to K of HP and we would like to put a proposal together for same I do not know the location as they did not want to divulge this wo a CA in place I will of course forward whatever form of CA you furnish to me as a DRAFT

Intergen CA Cc conversation below is the info you requested Counterparty InterGen Energy North America Fannin Ste Houston Texas Attn Dave Rogers Scope The scope of our discussions will encompass at the minimum physically connecting to Intergens MW Deweyville power plant to the AS line and executing monthly transactions and at the other end of the spectrum connecting to their plant and tolling our gas on a long term arrangement Information Flow The info flow will be bidirectional and will range from pure engineering info relative to our pipe specs to notional price information We would like to have our first meeting with Intergen next week so please let me know if there is any other information you will need to prepare a CA

Intergen CA Cc little My dogs better than your dog here You know your fellow lawyers Would you mind taking a look at this and marking same Let me know if this is OK Call me at if you have any questions Forwarded by Ned HigginsHOUECT on PM Rogers David NTERGENcom on PM To Ned Higgins cc Subject FW HPL conf agrm I found out that we have developed a CA Please review it and let me know if it works Conf Agmt formdoc Conf Agmt formdoc

FW Enron conf agrmis the latest draft CA from Intergen for their Deweyville plant Please take a look and advise Forwarded by Ned HigginsHOUECT on AM Rogers David NTERGENcom on AM To Ned Higgins cc Subject FW Enron conf agrm Here is the final Well get the orignal to you this week Original Message From Pedigo Doug Sent Thursday June AM To Powell Kathy Cc Rogers David Subject Enron conf agrm Attached is the final version of the Enron conf agrm Please run two originals for Dave Rogers If time is of the essence we can consider this to be my electronic intitials and we can have any VP in Houston sign off on it I can initial the hard copies when they circle back after signature by Enron Enron conf agrmdoc Enron conf agrmdoc

Rusk Co Electric Cc NonPrivilegedpst Per our conversation last Friday please prepare a CA for the two projects ECS is working on with Rusk County Electric RCE As requested the following is the info for both projects Oakhill Location Rusk Co TX Legal Entity NameOakhill Pipeline Facility Name Oakhill Pipelines Hinkle Compressor Station Project Description Add Hp to OHPs existing station Carthage Location Carthage TX Legal Entity Name Anadarko Energy Services Company Facility Name Anadarkos Carthage Facility Project Description Add replace to Hp to Anadarkos Carthage facility As a recap to our conversation on Friday we want to make sure the deatails of our request for service will be held private for at least six months and preferably longer Give me a call at if you have any questions Thanks Ned

More CAs Deals to followNonPrivilegedpst As promised The Illinois Power CA info is CounterpartyIllinois Power Sth Decataur Ill Attn Steve Warren Deal info IP is the Utility relative to our proposed NICOR transaction Facility Nicor Storage Facility at Troy Grove Ill Note IP is owned by Dynegy however I understand that IP is bound by affiliate rules with regards to Dynegy How comfortable are you with this Do you think we need additional language in the CA to protect us With regards to the Devon CA the following are the Devon comments You should add at the beginning of paragraph the following Each party represents that in providing Confidential Information to the other it has the right and authority to do so Whenever we look at a CA we should endeavor to limit it in time and coverage You say that the agreement concerns purchase of electricity in the Carthage area but in the opening paragraph the CA states that it is related to a proposed sale andor purchase of natural gas or fuel You should get this clarified to say something more definitive For example more definitive language would be something like in connection with a proposed sale andor purchase of electricity in the Carthage Field area for purpose of providing power to compression facilities Other than that the CA looks good Thanks Blaine Wofford AM Jim do you mind taking a quick look at this document Its relative to the purchase of electricity for the Carthage area Thanks Blaine
Troy Grove Driving DirectionsThe Troy Grove driving directions from Chicago West to I then South on to Westthen West on to then South Approx mile Thus location is off of Rte one mile South of

Comm Ed OpinionGerald the ILL atty Chris Hilgert referred to is Chris Townsend His number is The specific question is can we utilize Com Ed for E service at Nicors Troy Grove Facility Located near Troy Grove ILL approx Miles North of the Town of La Salle ILL The Com Ed substation we would like to have power delivered at is approx Miles N of the facility near the town of Mendota ILL Notes Nicor does not currently have an ILL Power service dropThey are totally self gen We would build line up to Com Ed and buy at the substation

FW CA AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Gerald for your review Please provide me with your comments as soon as possible Original Message From mailto Sent Monday September PM To Higgins Ned Subject CA Agreement Please review and comment See attached file CAdoc

CAsNonPrivilegedpst Per my previous voice mail could you please prepare CAs for both Anadarko Petroleum Corporation Timberloch Place The Woodlands TX and Duke Energy Field Services Westheimer Ste Houston TX As mentioned both CAs are for the purposes of data sharing relative to Elec compression projects

FW CAsNonPrivilegedpst The Anadarko project is located approx mi due west of Carthage TX in Panola Co The Duke project is located mi NW of the town of Falfurrias in Jim Wells Co TX Both projects contemplate an eletrical drive retrofit of existing gas compression facilities The Anadarko project is Hp and the Duke project is Hp Let me know if you need any additional info Thanks Original Message From Higgins Ned Sent Tuesday June PM To Nemec Gerald Subject CAs Per my previous voice mail could you please prepare CAs for both Anadarko Petroleum Corporation Timberloch Place The Woodlands TX and Duke Energy Field Services Westheimer Ste Houston TX As mentioned both CAs are for the purposes of data sharing relative to Elec compression projects
